title: Acropolis - nice sight
text:
Try to go early in the morning so that the crowd is less. Also take a camera with a good telephoto lens. you have nice views of the city.
However be very careful of thieves. They are all over the place. The public and police do nothing about it. They snatch anything from tourists. They dont target locals.
Athens screams THIEVES THIEVES THIEVES everywhere

title: Late
text:
This flight is delayed more than 90% of the time.
If you want to reach bangalore on time, take the indigo at 1720 from pune

title: My trip to Istanbul and Cappadocia - Best experience
text: I got all the information and help from MyTrip travel and there was no difference to what was delivered and what was promised. I had a great tour of Cappadocia. All the pick up and drop off with perfect timing. Lots of fun on the way as well

title: Great balloon ride
text:
The pilot was very skilful and provided some real touchy moments of the trees and cliffs.
The landing was really smooth

title: Not cashless
text:
They dont accept cards and charge 4% extra for card payments.
They have displayed some outdated government circulars and showed them to me for not accepting card payments. Usually as travellers we dont have to carry much cash. Please avoid this place if you dont have much cash
